scripts.test: npm run reset:db-test && turbo run dev:test & && wait-on http://localhost:5174/api/health && turbo run test --concurrency=1 && docker compose -f docker-compose-test.yml down && npm run kill:dev-test
scripts.reset:db-test: docker compose -f docker-compose-test.yml up -d && node -e "setTimeout(() => {}, 1000)" && dotenv -e .env.test -- prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.build:tests-cache: time -p sh -c 'npm run test && docker compose build'
scripts.build:tests-no-cache: time -p sh -c 'jest --clearCache && npm run test && docker compose build --no-cache'
scripts.deploy:no-tests-cache: time -p sh -c 'docker compose build && docker compose up -d'
scripts.deploy:no-tests-no-cache: time -p sh -c 'docker compose build --no-cache && docker compose up -d'
scripts.deploy:tests-cache: time -p sh -c 'npm run test && docker compose build && docker compose up -d'
scripts.deploy:tests-no-cache: time -p sh -c 'jest --clearCache && npm run test && docker compose build --no-cache && docker compose up -d'
